body:
hey,

i added some map.pngs to nexus. you can use them as youtube thumbnails and stuff. not sure what you guys will use it for ultimately, but all the map.pngs for other gamemodes will roll out soon and ill be sure to take good images. i didnt exactly take it from a professional approach, but rather for a thing for thumbnails or just to familiarize which map is which such as "hey, i played a nexus map and idk what it is" where you can't describe, well now you can see them on maps.avicus.net

http://maps.avicus.net/Nexus/ (coming soon to other gamemodes)

http://maps.avicus.net/Nexus/Edron/map.png as an example, you can also link them in posts, try it :)

replies.body: It would be pretty cool for each map to have its own thumbnail.

I'll also try what Merlin suggested

replies.body:
Can we help you?
Like we make screenshots of the maps and then we post an imgur album here. You can choose some pictures and add them to the maps?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Hey!I was thinking that maybe a Admin(ej Fluenza_)Could give us the Nebula maps and Plugin to download!This would be perfect for scrimmages against other teams,and we could make even unofficial Avicus Network tourneys.Hope someone replies

replies.body: They are! You download <u>a map/the chunks which are</u> loaded if you join the Gameserver. You download them temporarily until you leave. Then, the maps will be deleted :p Pretty sure you already know that LOL. Nobody could play Nebula, if they aren't allowed to download the maps >:D
replies.body_tagged: They are! You download <u>a map/the chunks which are</u> loaded if you join the Gameserver. You download them temporarily until you leave. Then, the maps will be deleted :p Pretty sure you already know that LOL. Nobody could play Nebula, if they aren't allowed to download the maps >:D

reply_to.body: The plugin and it's maps are not up for download.
